title: Kill Me Baby: Butsuzou Kegatte Nise Halloween
original_name: キルミーベイベー　ぶつぞうけがってにせはろうぃーん
opening_song: "Kill Me no Baby! (キルミーのベイベー!)" by Yasuna to Sonya (Chinatsu Akasaki & Mutsumi Tamura)
ending_song: "Futari no Kimochi no Honto no Himitsu (ふたりのきもちのほんとのひみつ)" by Yasuna to Sonya
sinopse:
Bundled with the franchise's Kill Me Baby Super Best Album CD (キルミーベイベー・スーパー). OAD adapted eight previously unanimated story episodes from Kazuho's original manga.

(Source: ANN)
